general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and key initiatives at Sharda University, including its academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also highlights administrative reports, student support services such as the Academic Bank of Credits and counselling, and developmental programs focusing on skills, entrepreneurship, and innovation. The text further details important university information like its history, leadership, statutory bodies, tenders, and legal frameworks, along with specific initiatives such as FM Radio, visa guidelines, and international collaboration programs.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a course, specifically mentioning roles like Sports and Fitness Nutritionist and opportunities at Rajiv Gandhi Cancer Hospital, suggesting a progression into the medical field.

university_services.summary: This text appears to be a list of various sections, programs, and services offered by or related to Sharda University. It covers academic aspects like sample papers, global knowledge seekers, and courses on human values, as well as administrative and support functions such as recruiters, banking and postal services, accommodation, visa guidelines, and counselling services. Additionally, it includes initiatives related to skill enhancement, technology trends, entrepreneurship, media (FM radio), and international programs, along with specific university branches in Uzbekistan and Agra.
